short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: MultiPost 是一个帮助你在多个平台同步发布内容的工具。
short.en: MultiPost is a tool to help you sync and publish content across multiple platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: Multipost 将辅助你通过自动化的方式规划自媒体的内容发布，一键将内容发布到多个平台。
long.en: Multipost will assist you in planning and automating the publication of content for self-media, allowing you to publish content to multiple platforms with a single click.
